LootConfigReader - Class in Explorer
Class that contains methods to read a .properties configfile where block item IDs and their weights for spawning in storages are defined.
LootConfigReader(Mod) - Constructor for class Explorer.LootConfigReader
constructor
LootController - Class in Explorer
Collection of methods used for creating lists of loot which are put into entities inventories.

Constructor
LootItem - Class in Explorer
STARMADE MOD CREATOR: Max1M DATE: 23.09.2020 TIME: 01:01 Data container for a block item and its probabilty values range is used for a pointer to get items based on their weight.
LootItem(int, int, int) - Constructor for class Explorer.LootItem
Constructor
LoreHandler - Class in Explorer
this class reads the lore config files and turns them into LoreShort class instances it saves all of these instances to a list it can be called from outside, takes in specifications for the type of lore you want and returns the fitting loreshort every time a new loreshort is requested, the config file is read again: allows for chaning of config during runtime.
LoreHandler(Mod) - Constructor for class Explorer.LoreHandler
constructor initializes Reading of config
loreList - Variable in class Explorer.LoreHandler
stores the LoreShorts.
LoreShort - Class in Explorer
STARMADE MOD CREATOR: Max1M DATE: 16.09.2020 TIME: 13:00 this class is built from config files for each lore text entry it holds info about in what ship/station etc it can appear.
LoreShort(String, int[], int[]) - Constructor for class Explorer.LoreShort
